entries.description: Configure Ingress Hostname cluster settings of OpenStack provider via the cluster wizard.
Fix OOM in usercluster-controller by limiting the history of helm releases. This fix is critical if user-cluster is using Cilium >= 1.13.0 as CNI.
Pull konnectivity images from registry.k8s.io instead of legacy GCR registry.
Fix calculation of node CPU utilisation in MLA Grafana dashboards.
Show correct health information for Machine Deployments with no replicas.
AWS subnets are fetched correctly if credentials are provided directly instead of using a preset.
Fix cluster wizard not selecting a default version if custom versions are configured in KubermaticConfiguration.
Update external-snapshotter validation webhook server to v6.0.1, fixing the default-storageclass addon for OpenStack clusters.
